name: MetaVisa
introduce: Metavisa is a Web 3.0 credit score protocol empowers users to create and display a 100% secure, certified on-chain identity record, delivering opportunities for whitelisting Web3 projects, greater cryptocurrency loan rates, and new levels of trust & transparency to Web3. The metavisa credit score system will award users with ranked badges based on their on-chain identity. Users with higher MCSs will be rewarded with high-ranking badges, unlocking privileges and rewards from various partners and DApps.
